Topic :: Internet :: WWW/HTTP :: Dynamic Content :: Message Boards
info.description:
Palabre is meant to be used in replacement (for example) of the Macromedia Flash
Communication Server (FlashCom or Flash Media Server)
It has all the basic functionnalities for connecting Flash based Clients through
Xml Sockets (sending and receiving messages).
So you can use it to create, multi-user applications like a Chat, (almost) Real
Time Flash Games, Online support, IM clients, ...
It supports rooms, subrooms, private messages, database identification, custom
XML nodes, and much more ...
info.keywords: socket async asyncore xml flash actionscript
info.name: Palabre
